url.description: OPTIONAL: stream url, is validated when type is 1

created_at.description: unix timestamp (in milliseconds) of when the activity was added to the user's session

timestamps.description: OPTIONAL: unix timestamps for start and/or end of the game

application_id.description: OPTIONAL: application id for the game

details.description: OPTIONAL: what the player is currently doing

state.description: OPTIONAL: the user's current party status

emoji.description: OPTIONAL: the emoji used for a custom status

party.description: OPTIONAL: information for the current party of the player

assets.description: OPTIONAL: images for the presence and their hover texts

secrets.description: OPTIONAL: secrets for Rich Presence joining and spectating

instance.description: OPTIONAL: whether or not the activity is an instanced game session

flags.description: OPTIONAL: activity flags ORd together, describes what the payload includes

buttons.description: OPTIONAL: the custom buttons shown in the Rich Presence (max 2)

items.description: When received over the gateway, the buttons field is an array of strings, which are the button labels. Bots cannot access a user's activity button URLs. When sending, the buttons field must be an array of the below object:

label.description: the text shown on the button (1-32 characters)

url.description: the url opened when clicking the button (1-512 characters)
